title: Mel B haunted by nightmare of ‘abusive’ ex Stephen Belafonte cutting off her finger
text:

Mel B has confessed she's haunted by a gory nightmare in which her ex-husband Stephen Belafonte cuts off her finger

The Spice Girls star, 44, accused her former partner of abusing her during their 10-year marriage, and he strongly denied the allegations.

She has now claimed she's crippled by flashbacks and terrifying dreams about Stephen.

One particularly vivid nightmare left her screaming, and her mum Andrea had to reassure her it wasn't real.

Mel told The Sun : "I came running down the stairs because I thought my ex had cut my finger off.

“I thought it had actually happened because he was threatening to do that. I was convinced my finger was gone and my mum had to reassure me it was still there.

"I have to remind myself that I’m living in the present and that the flashback is my brain playing tricks on me."

(Image: Daniele Venturelli/WireImage)

Mel has said she's been struggling with post traumatic stress disorder PTSD) since her marriage broke down in 2016.

They divorced the following year and spent months battling it out in a nasty court battle before finally reaching a settlement.

She says leaving her husband was just the first step, and she still has a long way to go before she's healed.

The singer added: "Even though you have left your abuser... that pain and anxiety is always there...

(Image: Clint Brewer / Splash News)

"I still wake up with night sweats. I know he’s not there but I still have flashbacks and that’s ongoing."

She credits leaving Los Angeles and moving back to Leeds to live with her much with helping her through the process.

Since her experience, Mel has become a patron of the Women's Aid charity and is part of a campaign fighting to make sure the Government gives better funding to help domestic abuse victims.
